results.content: It's amazing that I have purchases so many lessons on Udemy that have 20-40 sections to learn redux and this accomplished so much with just 7 and a little under 2 hours. If you want a good core understanding of redux in a react app, this is a great course.
results.content_html: It's amazing that I have purchases so many lessons on Udemy that have 20-40 sections to learn redux and this accomplished so much with just 7 and a little under 2 hours. If you want a good core understanding of redux in a react app, this is a great course.

results.content: Good course overall. Shows the basic concepts of using Redux with React. It could have used some info on 'gotchas' or more complex cases with async actions, like when you have to have to make a second call on the basis of the first to complete the picture (like getting the value of a userId in the initial set of returned records)
results.content_html: Good course overall. Shows the basic concepts of using Redux with React. It could have used some info on 'gotchas' or more complex cases with async actions, like when you have to have to make a second call on the basis of the first to complete the picture (like getting the value of a userId in the initial set of returned records)

results.content: Nice, direct and relevant. Ray stays focused with Redux and Redux-thunk so you can see and use the technology. I recommend this course.
results.content_html: Nice, direct and relevant. Ray stays focused with Redux and Redux-thunk so you can see and use the technology. I recommend this course.

results.content: This course describes Redux quickly and easily. Probably one of the most useful courses on this topic simply because it's short and easy to understand.

results.content: Very good resource, I learnt a lot, I got the basics of redux

results.content: So far the course is average however because it was a specialist course on just Redux I expected a bit more. Like reasons we should use Redux and an initial high level explanation of what Redux is before going straight into an example. If you have purchased other React courses that include Redux you probably don’t need this course. If you haven’t then this is a good start to Redux.
results.content_html: So far the course is average however because it was a specialist course on just Redux I expected a bit more. Like reasons we should use Redux and an initial high level explanation of what Redux is before going straight into an example. If you have purchased other React courses that include Redux you probably don’t need this course. If you haven’t then this is a good start to Redux.
